name: Labia
message:
On my first day in Oz several years back (Being a Pom) I was gifted with a viewing of this, to my mind, funniest film ever ever ever.

I've been directed to this site having Googled somewhere to find a DVD version (I have it on VHS)

If you're still up and running and you could give me a pointer, THAT'D BE GROUSE!!!!
